summary: An ordinance providing for the refund of $86.10 in favor of H. C. Ostrom out of East 45th Street et al, condemnation fund, Ordinance No. 17947, for the purpose of reimbursing H. C. Ostrom, who purchased lot 11, block 13, Brooklyn Addition, which was inadvertently sold by the City Treasurer on March 31, 1911, when as a matter of fact the assessment had been appealed from by the original owner and is now pending a hearing before the Supreme Court.
